properties.name: spring.cloud.blossom.config.config-id
properties.description: Direct project configuration ID for the current project.

properties.name: spring.cloud.blossom.config.server-addr
properties.description: Server address of the configuration center in the format 'localhost:9999'.

properties.name: spring.cloud.blossom.config.username
properties.description: Username for access authentication to the configuration center.

properties.name: spring.cloud.blossom.config.password
properties.description: Password for access authentication to the configuration center.

properties.name: spring.cloud.blossom.config.namespace
properties.description: Namespace of the configuration center, default is 'DEFAULT'.

properties.name: spring.cloud.blossom.config.file-extension
properties.description: File extension of the configuration files, default is 'yml'.

properties.name: spring.cloud.blossom.config.timeout
properties.description: Timeout in milliseconds for fetching configurations from the center, default is 5000 ms.

properties.name: spring.cloud.blossom.config.max-retry
properties.description: Maximum number of retries for fetching configurations.

properties.name: spring.cloud.blossom.config.config-retry-time
properties.description: Interval time in milliseconds for retrying configuration fetch.

properties.name: spring.cloud.blossom.config.cluster-node-name
properties.description: Name of the cluster node. please do not overload the cluster, or ensure that the cluster node name is unique

properties.name: spring.cloud.blossom.config.refresh-enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable configuration refresh, default is true.
